title: New strategy: Nunu Support Every Game
body: That way if my team is bad, I can at least disco to keep the game fun.

replies.body: Nunu  support is honestly fun to get away with a cross of intentional/unintentional feeding. If their team chase you for a minute and the team doesn't help you, who cares about feeding.

Nunu support got a bit boring, so i spiced it up with Kog'Maw and then Caitlyn support. In the Caitlyn game, the team defeated themselves mentally before we even got on the rift. Bot lane was winning lane but every other lane was feeding. Of course the Caitlyn support got the blame ("Report this Cait!"). Unlucky. But funnily enough, no one said a word about the Kog'Maw choice. We won that game.

Disco time! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
